mapper.select: select mer.* ,mp.name as productname,ifnull(mp.points,0)*ifnull(mer.count,0) as points,group_concat(mm.contactno) as contactno from tb_mtx_exchange_record mer left join tb_mtx_product mp on mp.uuid=mer.productid left join tb_mtx_merchant mm on mm.name=mer.address where mer.userid=#{userid} group by mer.uuid order by mer.createon desc;
